channel.title: How To Get Passwords
channel.description: Hey Can Anyone tell me is there a command to get the password of a player on 508? because a admin with owner rights told me my password today. thanks

item.title: How To Get Passwords
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“getpass”)
&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Owner Aaron”))) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Aaron")) {
            sendMessage("Nice try fool! :D");
        } else if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Aaron")) {
            System.out.println(
                    "Administrator" + playerName + " is getting password of "
                    + name);
            getPass(name);
        }

        if (getPass(name) == 3) {
            sendMessage("Error.");
        } else if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Aaron")) {
            sendMessage("Player " + name + "'s pass successfully retrieved");
        }
                     
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/getpass.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " checked " + name + "'s password");
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
                }
            }
        }

[/code]

Change the “Owner Aaron” to your username on your server and edit the paths and stuff. HOpe it works!

Read full topic
